253998.content:
@"Zulul"#p253929 
```
SELECT l.name as fname, ROUND(ST_Distance(l.geom, b.geom)) as dist, b.name as depname
FROM landuse l, buildings b
WHERE l.fclass='forest' AND l.name IS NOT NULL 
AND (lower(b.name) LIKE '%vatrog%' OR lower(b.name) LIKE '%dvd%') 
ORDER BY fname, dist
```

254528.content:
Pretpostavite da ≈æelite naƒái najbli≈æu zalihu vode vatrogasnim domovima.

Za svaku zgradu koja u nazivu sadr≈æi niz znakova "vatrog" ili "dvd" (bez obzira na velika ili mala slova) ispisati ime zgrade i udaljenost do najbli≈æeg vodenog objekta ili rijeke (water, "water", "river") i naziv tog vodenog objekta (mora biti definiran).

Udaljenost zaokru≈æite na cijeli broj.

```
SELECT buildings.name AS ime_zgrade, ROUND(ST_Distance(water.geom,buildings.geom)) AS udaljenost, water.name AS vodeni_objekt
FROM buildings, water
WHERE water.name IS NOT NULL  AND (water.fclass='river' OR water.fclass='water')
AND (LOWER(buildings.name) LIKE '%vatrog%' OR LOWER(buildings.name) LIKE '%dvd%')
AND ST_Distance(water.geom, buildings.geom)=(
	SELECT DISTINCT MIN(ST_Distance(w2.geom, b2.geom)) OVER (PARTITION BY b2.name)
	FROM buildings AS b2, water AS w2
	WHERE buildings.gid=b2.gid AND (LOWER(b2.name) LIKE '%vatrog%' OR LOWER(b2.name) LIKE '%dvd%')
	AND w2.name IS NOT NULL AND (w2.fclass='water' OR w2.fclass='river')
)
```

254588.content:
Zna li netko ≈°to je krivo:

Zadatak:

Ispi≈°ite gid pruga kraƒáih od 20000m koje prolaze pokraj vinograda (landuse, "vineyard") na udaljenosti od 100m ili manje i broj vinograda.

```
select distinct railways.gid,count(*) over() cnt
from railways, landuse
where landuse.fclass = 'vineyard'
and st_length(railways.geom) < 20000
and st_disjoint(railways.geom,landuse.geom)
and st_distance(railways.geom,landuse.geom) <= 100
```

254644.content:
@"jazzMassive"#p254635 Mene isto zanima ≈°to je toƒçan rezultat. Ovo je moj kod koji takoƒëer ne radi:

```
select land1.gid, st_area(land1.geom)
from landuse land1, landuse land2
where land1.fclass = 'residential'
and (land2.fclass = 'forest' or land2.fclass = 'grass' or land2.fclass = 'park')
and ST_Touches(land1.geom, land2.geom)
and st_within(land1.geom, (select muny.geom
                          from muny
                          where lower(muny.name_2) = 'vis'))
```

254784.content:
@"Forhome"#p254758 Samo sam ispravio napravio ono sto je kolegica rekla: 

u predzanjem group by sam prije "name_2" dodao "krizanjaPoOpcini" pa imam oba odvojena zarezom

i u ove where uvjete u sredini sam dodao "AND muny.name_1 = 'Splitsko-dalmatinska' " -> e sad tu nisam siguran je li muny.name_1 ili name, i provjeri da je ovo Splitsko-dalmatinska napisano tocno kako je u bazi
